title: HSBC Cuts 10% of US Debt Capital Markets Team Amid Overhaul
description: HSBC cut 10% of its US-based debt capital markets team, continuing to cull costs after announcing a revamp of the business last October, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: HSBC cut 10% of its US-based debt capital markets team, continuing to cull costs after announcing a revamp of the business last October, according to people familiar with the matter.
